requirements.name: Project
requirements.description:
1. A notification service that can send notifications via email, SMS, and in-app channels.
2. A user
requirements:
1. A notification service that can send notifications via email, SMS, and in-app channels.
2. A user interface for users to configure their notification preferences.
3. A templating system for creating notification content.
4. A tracking system to monitor the delivery status of each notification.
5. A retry mechanism to resend notifications that failed to deliver.
6. The system should be scalable and capable of handling thousands of notifications per minute.
7. Integration with the existing AIDevOS platform.
8. Compliance with data privacy and security standards.
9. A reporting system to provide insights into the performance of the notification system.
10. The system should be designed to be easily maintainable and upgradable.
